About.title: A biased Next.js documentation site template
About.intro: Nextempura is built with Next.js, styled using SCSS and CSS variables, supports internationalization with next-intl, features markdown documentation through unified and remark, and supports light/dark theme switching.
About.use: This template is not intended for out-of-box use; instead, it provides components that you can use to develop a custom template tailored to your preferences.
About.ending: If you have any feature suggestions or improvements, please feel free to email hblee12294@gmail.com or create an issue.
